subject: Basketball
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: Celtics General Manager Danny Ainge was fined $25,000 by the N.B.A. for tossing a towel to try to distract Cavaliers forward J. J. Hickson as he shot a free throw.
snippet: Celtics General Manager Danny Ainge was fined $25,000 by the N.B.A. for tossing a towel to try to distract Cavaliers forward J. J. Hickson as he shot a free throw.
